sentences.sContent: Monitors and investigates spoilage and recommends appropriate actions to reduce.
sentences.sContent_eng: Monitors and investigates spoilage and recommends appropriate actions to reduce.
sentences.sCn: 监督和调查损坏的物品并提供减少损坏的建议。

sentences.sContent: Monitors and investigates spoilage and recommends appropriate actions to reduce.
sentences.sContent_eng: Monitors and investigates spoilage and recommends appropriate actions to reduce.
sentences.sCn: 监督并审查破损并采取适当的措施减少损坏。

words.tran: 宠坏；毁坏（spoil的过去式及过去分词）

trans.tranOther: waste resulting from something being spoiled
